name: Pixel Cavern
description:
Fight your way through the cavern and destroy the nuclear reactor with your best shot in this vintage, minimalistic cave flyer.

The rules are easy. Shoot or dodge enemies and advance the cavern. Pay attantion to your energy and charge it on time - otherwise your weapon system will power down.

This game is coded in JavaScript and supports mouse, keyboard and touch control.

Keyboard Controls:

Right'd', '6' or '→'
Left'a', '4' or '←'Up'w', '8' or '↑'Down's', '5' or '↓'Fire'ctrl', 'f' or 'space' ( hold for auto fire or trigger for rapid fire )Pause'p' ( shoot or 'p' to continue )
Color'c'Mute'm'1Up
at 3000 and 6000 points

Have fun - preussie
